list.label: Server Name
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "java.lang_value" WITH KEY = "host"

targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "java.lang_" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^web-server-/ AND time > now() - 40s GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("value") FROM "java.lang_" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^batch\-server\-/ AND time > now() - 40s GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "redisLog4jAppender_" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type_instance" = 'ConnectFailures' AND time > now() - 1h fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "java.lang_" WHERE "type_instance" = 'SystemCpuLoad' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^web-server\-/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "java.lang_" WHERE "type_instance" = 'ProcessCpuLoad' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^web-server\-/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "java.lang_" WHERE "type_instance" = 'TotalPhysicalMemorySize' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^web-server\-/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "java.lang_" WHERE "type_instance" = 'FreePhysicalMemorySize' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^web-server\-/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "java.lang_" WHERE "type_instance" = 'CommittedVirtualMemorySize' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^web-server\-/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "java.lang_" WHERE "type_instance" = 'ProcessCpuLoad' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^web\-server\-/ AND time > now() - 40s fill(null)
